# star-rating

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Description

Renders a series of clickable star icons

## Properties

| Attribute              | Description                                     | Type                |
| ---------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `maxStars`             | Number of star icons to be rendered             | `number`            |
| `currentRating`        | Number of selected star icons to be rendered    | `number`            |
| `color`                | Stores the star icon's color                    | `string`            |
| `starList`             | Used to store and render the star html elements | `string`            |

----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
